<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Remove Playlist Items"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/v1/playlists/{{Playlist_Id}}/tracks"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Remove one or more items from a user's playlist.

**Note:** Authorization scopes- **playlist-modify-public**, **playlist-modify-private**

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Playlist_Id","description":"The Spotify ID of the playlist.","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"snapshot_id":{"type":"string","example":"AAAABSs9PBSwdiXanc1JGdC9NUiBqIV6"},"tracks":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"uri":{"type":"string","example":"spotify:track:4iV5W9uYEdYUVa79Axb7Rh"}}},"example":[{"uri":"spotify:track:4iV5W9uYEdYUVa79Axb7Rh"}]}}},"examples":{"Remove Playlist Items":{"value":{"snapshot_id":"AAAABSs9PBSwdiXanc1JGdC9NUiBqIV6","tracks":[{"uri":"spotify:track:4iV5W9uYEdYUVa79Axb7Rh"}]}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
